title: Fix portfolio gallery images and reorganize into categorized sections

requirements.text: Replace the portfolio gallery component to display four separate tab categories: Home, Commercial, Office, and Hotels. Each category should be selectable via tabs and display its own set of project images with titles and descriptions in a dialog-based lightbox interface

quotes: You want sections for home, commercial, office, and hotels

acceptanceCriteria: Portfolio gallery displays four tabs labeled Home, Commercial, Office, and Hotels
Clicking a tab switches the displayed image grid to that category
Each category displays its own distinct set of interior design images
Images open in a dialog lightbox when clicked
Navigation between tabs maintains the same UI pattern as existing gallery

requirements.text: Render all generated portfolio images from frontend/public/assets/generated directory. Display 30 images per category (Home, Commercial, Office, Hotels) for a total of 120 portfolio images. Each image must display with its title and detailed description when viewed in the lightbox

quotes: Add 30 images per section (120 total images) with specific, detailed descriptions for each

acceptanceCriteria: Home category displays 30 residential interior design images
Commercial category displays 30 commercial space interior images
Office category displays 30 office interior design images
Hotels category displays 30 hotel interior design images
Each image displays a title in the lightbox dialog
Each image displays a detailed description in the lightbox dialog
All images load from frontend/public/assets/generated directory

constraints: Do not change the Navigation, HeroSection, ServicesSection, AboutSection, ContactSection, or ContactForm components
Maintain the existing dialog-based lightbox pattern from PortfolioGallery.tsx
Use the established luxury design aesthetic with warm earth tones and gold accents
nonGoals: Adding titles and descriptions to images outside the portfolio gallery
Adding backend storage for portfolio images
